file.name: openapi-authentication.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0 servers: # Added by API Auto Mocking Plugin - description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/Gofore/X-Road-Auth/1.0.0 - description: X-Road API Design url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/Gofore/X-Road/1.0.0 info: description: X-Road UI Authentication version: "1.0.1" title: X-Road UI Based API contact: email: lauri.koutaniemi@gofore.com license: name: MIT url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT tags: - name: security server description:
Security Server operations and API calls - name: central server description:
Central Server operations and API calls paths: /login: post: # ok tags: - security server summary: Logs in and returns the authentication cookie requestBody: required: true description: A JSON object containing the login and password. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/LoginRequest' responses: '200': description: > Successfully authenticated. The session ID is returned in a cookie named `JSESSIONID`. You need to include this cookie in subsequent requests. headers: Set-Cookie: description: session cookie schema: type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 255 example: JSESSIONID=abcde12345; Path=/; "\0Set-Cookie": description: XSRF token schema: type: string example: XSRF-TOKEN=fghijk678910; Path=/; HttpOnly '400': description: request was invalid '401': description: authentication credentials are missing '403': description: request has been refused '404': description: resource requested does not exists '406': description: request specified an invalid format '409': description: an existing item already exists '500': description: internal server error /logout: delete: # ok tags: - security server summary: logout from the UI operationId: logout description: SS administrator logs out from UI. parameters: - in: header name: X-XSRF-TOKEN schema: type: string format: text example: fghijk678910 required: true responses: '204': description: deletion was successful '400': description: request was invalid '401': description: authentication credentials are missing '403': description: request has been refused '404': description: resource requested does not exists '500': description: internal server error components: securitySchemes: CookieAuth: type: apiKey in: cookie name: JSESSIONID schemas: LoginRequest: # ok type: object required: - username - password properties: username: type: string format: text example: username minLength: 4 maxLength: 255 password: type: string format: password example: Password123 minLength: 4 maxLength: 255 security: - CookieAuth: []

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/login": post: responses: 200: headers: header "\x00Set-Cookie": at 1:1053: invalid header name "\x00Set-Cookie"
